name: The Forgotten Ruins (Galvin09)
description:
Synopsis:

The Forgotten Ruins is a story-driven and  roguelike game about an adventurers looking for a hidden treasure within the ruins. Play as protagonist with their teammates: Albert, Azraelle, and Cassey. The party take a challenge following the Book of Forgotten to get the treasure for their wealth. But, can they come back alive under the bright sun?

Gameplay:

You have to reach the exit of the ruins while you must sacrifice your power to open the gate on each floor. There are no item to revive the character.

Reversed Progress:
  • Your characters level will be decreased each floor.
  • Your main character will lost some skill to open the portal.
  • The flashback is written in backward.

Project Backstory:

The core purpose of this game  is as an experimental material using a story format and gameplay that are still rarely made.

As you like my work, then support me by donating to this game. So I can make more games for you to experience.
